website_summaries.verdict: These plates feature a cast iron core that helps maintain balance and prevent damage to your bar.
pros: Pair of two bumper plates.Made from virgin and recycled rubber
Steel insert allows secure fit and prevents damage to bar
Cast iron core provides balanced weight
cons: May arrive with a slightly greasy coating, but this wipes off easily
Can be damaged if you do snatches

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Love these bumpers. Sturdy, consistent, perfect amount of bounce, all at a great price. Sorry for the lame video btw, just wanted to show the amount of bounce on these bad boys... they’re perfect
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What It Says on the Tin
customer_reviews.text: They're bumper weights. They're heavy -- or light, depending on which ones you bought. (I bought the 10 lb. pair, so pretty light.) They fit on a standard 2" diameter Olympic bar (see pictures, I'm using the Cap's The Beast). Mine were packaged well, no damage. Yes, they do have a greasy coating -- which is easily wiped off with a rag and some cleaning solution (used Simple Green for this). Yes, they do have a "petro-chemically" smell but they're coated in plastic so you should kinda expect it to smell, besides, you're probably not lifting at the perfume counter in Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Schmam

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: They fit very snug on my bar, and are a little difficult to take off. My other plates don't have that problem. One of the 25# plates hole is crooked, so the plate will not sit flush against any plate next to it, since it will be angled However, for the price i think the quality is ok.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shinn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not use for snatches if you drop weights as mine is starting to split from the center!
customer_reviews.author: zattack

customer_reviews.title: Poorly machined; ruined bar.  Use with caution!
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great, but the hole on one of the two was poorly machined (just barely too small) & ruined my bar. Be careful! If it seems to rub at all, send it back IMMEDIATELY. Their customer service basically just shrugged when I wrote them & told me tough luck. They only warranty for 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Jkeepgoing

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for Crossfit or Olympic lifting.
customer_reviews.text: Despite being bumper plates they are not very sturdy or durable if you plan on dropping them a lot during WODs or Olympic lifting. They have warped a bit after only a few months of use. I still use them for less dynamic lifting and they are absolutely fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: K. W. Regis

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Cap makes great budget workout gear and these plates are no exception. I gave it 4 stars simply because the build quality isn't the best around the center ring but that is not surprising for what you are paying. I am going to order bigger plates 15,25 and so on so that should tell you they are worth it. I use them almost daily for months now and no issues with dropping. Great for starting workouts or your own box. I did not get a discount nor did I receive these for free for this review.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great product, concerning fumes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Shipped quickly. I read the reviews about the smell and decided to take a chance. They did have a strong odor and an oily substance on them and I tried to wipe them off. It took a couple weeks for the smell to go away and most of the oil came off with effort. The smell did concern me. It would be a great product if they could eliminate the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Connie H

customer_reviews.title: Great Bumper Plates but not Super Premium
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to our home gym but they are not top gym quality like you would find in a gym chain. So far they have held up well to my dead lifts and they are weighted correctly. They do smell and that smell will last a while. Overall they are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: GchanMako

customer_reviews.title: Great plates
customer_reviews.text: Rugged and sturdy. Put them a pounding and they look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Collapse within minutes of loading
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an ok product at first. They DO NOT hold up at all. Have only had these since mid May 2020 (2months) and the pictures speak for themselves. These were NOT left loaded and sitting either. They collapse during your 2 minute rest between sets!! NOT RELIABLE
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Landis

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else to say except I love these bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely did the job for me. It did have the smell at first but literally after only a day of airing it out, I haven't smelled it since. Nothing else to say except I love these bumper plates!
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Giving 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Product had an oily substance oil all over it and bad smell. Yes I cleaned it, and the off gas went away. 3 stars for me having to wash these weights. Should of been cleaned prior shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what ever your workout needs are!
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, works just like I need. Have had for 3 months now and can't complain one bit. Use it in my home gym with olympic lifts, dropped when needed and have had any problems...these don't have the bounce some others do so they might be a little loud for some when dropped but then again, some may not like the bounce either. Would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: C. Haniford

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Receive a pair of 45 pounds for weightlifting and deadlifts in order to protect my floor and the barbell. They are perfect for the price. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bumpers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bumpers for the price. They don't smell and they're better quality than the Titan Fitness bumpers I bought. The Titans arrived mangled and some have bubbles in the rubber but the CAP plates are perfect all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Roper

customer_reviews.title: For novice!! Never had bumper weights. I ...
customer_reviews.text: For novice!! Never had bumper weights. I use for light workout as a novice. Probably ok if you are lookinto do harder workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Plates are exactly as presented. They fit great with the other plates. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: At first we had some small shipping issues but the seller rapidly fixed those issues and our full order was delivered. Otherwise, these plates are excellent. Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H.

customer_reviews.title: Good bumper plates
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a home gym. They have good bounce and I don't have to worry about them cracking so far or damaging my bar. Only downside is the first few weeks they have a smell.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what they say they are
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes them, got what he wanted and they are working well
customer_reviews.author: momster

customer_reviews.title: CAP Barbell Premium Bumper Plates, Black, Pair
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my bumper plates. I have been working out at home since the pandemic and really needed them to do dead lifts. I can add weight on each end with the bumper plates on the bar first. They ave made a difference in my training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Theae are nice plates and do the job well. Perfect for our home gym.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the weights but they were overpriced but I guess everything is with this quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Ared Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. solvent smell dissipated after week
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. solvent smell dissipated after week. Cleaning with paper towel and 409 cleaned off the oil and I feel expedited process (repeated 3 times per day.
customer_reviews.author: cnnmbrph

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with fit and has a greasy feel
customer_reviews.text: Only one of ther plates slides on smoothly and will only slide on one side of my bar/ plate rack. Both plates came with a greasy substance on them. I'd send back for refund if cost to send back wasn't prohibitively expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Bought during corona so overpaid but good product regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Soeders

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: There pretty nice for the price. Only problem is I wish they were slimmer to fit more weight on for compound movements like deadlifting and squatting, can’t fit any more bumper plates past 405 on my Olympic bar
customer_reviews.author: austin  clouse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Work great, and so far holding up and can't see that changing. Will be buying these in other weight sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for your home gym
customer_reviews.text: CAP products for the price can’t be beat. I’ve bought a ton of their equipment for my home gym and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Plates
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I was happy with these plates, I will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: quality for less
customer_reviews.text: After delivery of the wrong weights, amazon quickly fixed the problem and sent the correct ones. I am extremely happy with the quality of these CAP plates, especially for the price. I am definitely recommending these.
customer_reviews.author: K.B

customer_reviews.title: Decent deal
customer_reviews.text: Decent. Doesn’t lay flat against the bar but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: kourtney rollins

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I managed to snag a pair of these at a great price. They're great. They don't smell weird but they were slippery with grease for some reason. Just had to wipe them down with a rag.
customer_reviews.author: PANTHER17

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Do smell but I aired them out for a week on my patio and that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Smell was pretty awful when I got them, still has a residue and honestly the metal part on the inside could be better. But they work.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't abused them too hard but they seem like they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany White

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bumper Plates!
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality, comparable to other top of the line brand. These bumpers have a nice gloss finish to them. They are beveled/machined at the outer perimeter of the plates which gives them less surface impact if you drop the barbell. This may be of benefit too as the edges won't crack off. There was little to no odor with these bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Purse

customer_reviews.title: It's a weight!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Just a note, these are not the "crossfit" type weights that are "bendable", so I wouldn't recommend dropping the bar from overhead. Based on the description "Made from virgin and recycled rubber" I assumed these were solid rubber (like the crossfit weights), but there is another bullet explaining these have a metal core, but they still do the job.
customer_reviews.author: RTAL

customer_reviews.title: I read a review that said the plates smell and ...
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that said the plates smell and laughed but they do smell- quality average I bought three different brands and these ranked lowest
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good. but there is a noticeable rubber smell.
customer_reviews.author: zoey m.

customer_reviews.title: Not standard for olympic size
customer_reviews.text: One of the plates in my order doesn't fit on a standard olympic size bar.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... them for 3 months and they still have a terrible smell to
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for 3 months and they still have a terrible smell to them
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Connolley

customer_reviews.title: creepy, oily, smelly
customer_reviews.text: arrived covered in very creepy oily substance that comes off on your hands and they smell awful
customer_reviews.author: manchild mcguyver

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just received them this morning and was little worried about the quality but gotta say A+ its just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aelish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good basic rubber plates. No complaints. I've had them for a few months and they are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenH390

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: a little oil and smell out of the box, but good to go.
customer_reviews.author: COREY G.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: These are fine bumper plates for basic home weight training
customer_reviews.author: discerningeye

customer_reviews.title: which warp and bend too easily especially in hot boxes
customer_reviews.text: Buy the 15 lb plates rather than the 10 lb plates, which warp and bend too easily especially in hot boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: These weights smelled like cigarettes and stunk up my whole gym.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Malloy

customer_reviews.title: I bought the plates believing they were brand new but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the plates believing they were brand new but one of them was all scratched up which appeared to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Kessel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with plates
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with plates. They are a bit oily and give off an odd smell for a few days, but you cannot beat the price anywhere for bumper plates.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W

customer_reviews.title: Not standard Olympic diameter
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for Olympic sized bumper plates don’t waste your money on these they are larger than the standard 450mm. These are about 17-7/8” or nearly 1/4” larger in diameter than my Rogue fitness bumper plates. I guess I’ll keep them for squats, bench, etc. but these won’t be good for deadlifts or Olympic lifts. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price(they have since gone up)
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Great for the price(they have since gone up).
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a set of decent barbells. Happy with purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: A. McKee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plates don't even fit an Olympic size barbell - diameter top small!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but they are really
customer_reviews.text: They are bumper plates and function well as such. So far so good, but they are really, really greasy. Even after leaving them outside for a week, washing them, and cleaning them up they are still greasy. Would go somewhere else for non-greasy plates.
customer_reviews.author: travelbug555

customer_reviews.title: Hard Plastic Bumpers
customer_reviews.text: More plastic than rubber. No bounce or flex just hard plastic. Also larger than rubber bumpers in diameter causing them to hit the floor first. Also on of the plates won't slide on the bar as the hole is too small.
customer_reviews.author: BHowell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Slightly larger than the standard CAP Barbell 45 ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Slightly larger than the standard CAP Barbell 45 plates so you only need two to keep the hard plates from dropping. I use it on a 1/4" rubber mat in my cement garage and they have not damaged the floor. Great plates.
customer_reviews.author: paws

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Decent price and way thinner than I was ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Decent price and way thinner than I was expecting. We will see how they hold up after some use. There is a smell to them but I honestly don't care about that. It'll go away after a few days
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're weights. They're heavy. They're round. They have a hole in the middle for your barbell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bumpers for the price and free shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great bumpers for the price and free shipping. The rubber smell wasn't bad. There is a slight film on the bumpers, use a cloth and wipe it off. After a week of use no more film or smell. They have a dead bounce to them which is nice, you don't have to worry about them bouncing back and hitting you in the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I think it's fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Is not the same size as my other bumper plates so I can't stowe it on my rack. Other than that I think it's fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weights fit my Olympic bar perfectly, and they seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Weights fit my Olympic bar perfectly, and they seem to be of high quality. The only complaint is the copious amounts of grease that I had to clean from them, and the strong smell of chemicals that they gave off at first.
customer_reviews.author: Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: so as a novice crossfit'er - I love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: First set of bumper plates I've ever owned, so as a novice crossfit'er - I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Ordered, and came in next day. That's fast service and the product was awesome quality.
customer_reviews.author: ethan wehe

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed and discolored. Thin and somewhat flimsy. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Scuffed and discolored. Thin and somewhat flimsy. Had to air them out outside because of the strong smell and still strong. Much preferred RAGE plates.
customer_reviews.author: Volmom

customer_reviews.title: Grease all over these, not worth the hassle or painful physical symptoms. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Greasy garbage. Returned them. The THICK GREASE on these causes me to have a physical reaction similar to my experience with counterfeit olive oil and counterfeit cologne (itchy, prickly nerve pain at point of contact on skin and a marked sensation of dull pain in the joints of the limb that made contact as well as a drop in blood pressure). This isn't some "generic oil", it's some kind of industrial grease that is not supposed to come into contact with human skin. Amazon should ban the sale of this product.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell Premium Bumper Plates, Black, Pair
product_meta.description: This CAP Barbell bumper plate set offers protection for both the bar and the bumper plates with its sound construction. Steel insert hubs reinforce holes and protect the bar at the same time. This set can only be used with 2-inch Olympic bars.
feature_bullets: WHAT’S INCLUDED – TWO 35-pound premium bumper weight plates in black; Designed to accommodate Olympic barbells (with 2-inch center hole)
CONSTRUCTION – Cast iron core with a steel insert and coated in virgin and recycled rubber; All weights are uniform in diameter; 30-day manufacturer
FEATURES – The cast iron core offers a balanced weight; Rubber coating prevents damage to equipment; Steel insert offers a secure fit and prevent damage to the bar
Cast iron core provides balanced weight
TRUST – Trust experience. CAP has been a pioneer in the fitness industry for over 30 years and has locations worldwide. Chances are, if you have ever worked out before you have used a CAP product
